Option (B) may seem like a possibility at first, but it is not a logical conclusion because exercise alone does not always lead to weight loss or prevention of weight gain. Option (D) is also not a logical conclusion as the dog would not be gaining weight if it was refusing to eat.

Option (C) is the most reasonable conclusion because overindulging in meals and snacks would result in an increased calorie intake, which can lead to weight gain in dogs. Therefore, John concluded that the dog was overindulging in meals and snacks, leading to its chubby appearance.
